title: Humanoid Robot with Vision-Based Navigation
description: A miniature humanoid robot with 20 DoFs capable of navigating to an object, picking and placing it at the required location with fall recovery based on vision and a gyroscope sensor.

title: Virtual Hand Simulation using Hall Effect Sensors
description: A wireless physical wearable glove that allows users to interact in a virtual environment by manipulating the glove using Hall Effect sensors.

title: Radio Controlled Automatic Agricultural Robot
description: A radio-controlled robot capable of planting seeds automatically and watering based on soil moisture levels using an in-house seed planting mechanism and a moisture sensor.
